name: DiceRV
tagline: Dice random variables in Python made easy
body:
### Dice Random Variables.
Getting numerical and graphical stats about dice-rolling was never that easy.
```python
>>> import drv.rpg as rpg
>>> import drv.plot_tools as ptl
>>> ptl.plot_pmf_graph(rpg.ndk(3, 6), xkcd=True)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
